price: 78. Markaas waxaa raacay Fircoon oo wata askarahiisii, waxaana halkaas kaga daboo- lay xagga badda waxaasi daboolay15.
arabic: فَأَتۡبَعَهُمۡ فِرۡعَوۡنُ بِجُنُودِهِۦ فَغَشِيَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡيَمِّ مَا غَشِيَهُمۡ
footnotes: 15. Ma daboolin oo qaadin biyo oo keliya, balse waxaa daboolay oo wada qaatay waxaa daboolay uu Alle Keliya Ogsoon yahay sida argagax, xanuun, qoomamo, cadaab, iwm.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-atbaʿahum fir'ʿawnu bijunūdihi faghashiyahum mina al-yami mā ghashiyahum
